responses.rationale: The segment describes the location of cases but contains no negation.
The segment confirms a case but contains no negation.
The segment states the number of states with confirmed cases but contains no negation.
The segment explains the cause of spread but contains no negation.
The segment states the number of birds culled but contains no negation.
The segment states the number of birds culled in Iowa but contains no negation.
The segment provides statistics about Iowa's egg production but contains no negation.
The segment provides statistics about Iowa's turkey production but contains no negation.
